| HistoryText             = The Soldiers of Misfortune were the unwilling superhuman operatives of the [[Undertow]]. The soldiers had devices implanted in their bodies that gave the Undertow complete control of their agents actions. The Soldiers often committed atrocities for the Undertow like massacring African refugees.
